    StudyServiceUnitTest provides testing StudyService class.
    Author:
    Aleksandr Gaslov

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Sets up necessary test objects and mocks.

      • testCreateStudy

        public void testCreateStudy()
        Tests StudyService.createStudy(String, User) method.

      • testNextCard

        public void testNextCard()
        Tests StudyService.nextCard() method. Checks if correct card is returned or null if there are no cards left.

      • testProcessAnswer

        public void testProcessAnswer()
        Tests StudyService.processAnswer(Card, String) method.
        After wrong answer card's priority should be increased and number of correct answers in success should be set to zero.
        After correct answer number of correct answers in success should be increased.
        After second correct answer in success card's priority should be decreased and number of correct answers in success should be set to zero.

      • testCreateDict

        public void testCreateDict()
        Tests StudyService createDict() protected method. Checks if number of correct answers by success for all cards in dictionary is set to zero.
